lexUnit.name: prove.v

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: COD: demonstrate by evidence or argument the truth or existence of.

sentence.text: THE new television advertisement for the Volkswagen Golf shows a car being dropped , removed and returned as a cube of twisted metal -- to prove that it is recyclable .
Unfortunately , this does not prove that retinoic acid is the signal : it could be that it merely mimics the true signal .
It is tempting for any regime to claim that its very survival proves that it has consent and support .

It is surprising how many herbs can thus be fitted in before that agonizing search for a space for yet another indispensable plant proves that the only vacancy is the concrete path surrounding the dustbins .
` What happened to these two chaps proves the rumour is not true . "
` I have papers that prove the books have been forged but now I need someone to help me .
People who demanded miracles to prove his divine mission were refused : his power came from the presence of the Father and was discerned by those ` with ears to hear " .
` This spectacular discovery should once and for all prove what shape the original Globe was , " Martin Clout , the theatre architecture historian , said .
The follow-up , ` Grandpa 's Party " , proved how sharp she could be .
` The recent World Cup proved what a commercially lucrative venture rugby union can be .
History has proved it to be so .
Geometrical demonstrations which prove something to be true of all triangles do not do so by proving it to be true of an abstract triangle to which all triangles correspond .
You might destroy vital medical evidence which will help prove the case against the person who assaulted you .
There is no doubt that he was being obstinate and suspicious , but his competence had been proved by his latest publication .
The accuracy of your selection can only be proved by giving the remedy and the patient getting better .
Lack of consent must be proved by showing that the victim 's ` understanding and knowledge were such that she was not in a position to decide . "
Vietnamese officials provided Quinn with military evidence " proving " that Col. Robertson was dead , according to a Vietnam News Agency report on July 26 .
As of early September 2004 , Iran was cited as testing its Shehab-3 missile for a second time , further proving its persistence to test and develop its extended range missile capabilities .
We 've expanded Goodwill 's proven methods to towns and neighborhoods where they are needed most .
